markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 10" pfs="Limited">
[Nullify](/Spells.aspx?ID=958)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

**Trigger** a foe within range casts a 9th-level or lower spell

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** the triggering spell
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You instantly destroy the incoming spell, though at the cost of sending magical feedback through your body. You automatically [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the spell, but the feedback brings you unavoidable harm. You lose 1d8 Hit Points per level of the triggering spell.
name: Nullify

<traits>

</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 
</row>

---

<summary>
React to automatically counteract a spell and take backlash damage.
</summary>
summary: React to automatically counteract a spell and take backlash damage.
